main_definition: Grows refers to the process of increasing in size, quantity, or importance over time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Increase in physical size or height
meanings_and_examples.example: The plant grows taller as it receives more sunlight.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Development of skills, knowledge, or abilities
meanings_and_examples.example: He has grown significantly in his basketball skills over the past year.
The company has seen considerable growth since its establishment five years ago.
Rural areas around the city have been growing due to urban migration.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Increase in value, wealth, or influence
meanings_and_examples.example: After years of hard work and investment, their fortune has grown considerably.
